00018 #ifndef __NEIGHBORLIST_H
00019 #define __NEIGHBORLIST_H
00020 
00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmcalculator.h>
00022 #include <votca/tools/globals.h>
00023 #include <votca/ctp/qmpair.h>
00024 
00025 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00026 
00034 class Neighborlist : public QMCalculator
00035 {
00036 public:
00037     Neighborlist() {}
00038     ~Neighborlist() {}
00039 
00040     const char *Description() { return "Constructs a list of neighboring conjugated segments"; }
00041 
00042     void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00043     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00044 
00045 //protected:
00046 private:
00047     vector<double> _cutoff;
00048     vector<string> _typeA;
00049     vector<string> _typeB;
00050 
00051 };
00052 
00053 inline void Neighborlist::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options){
00054 
00055     // list of all sub-properties of options.neighborlist.segments
00056     list<Property *> segments = options->Select("options.neighborlist.segments");
00057     list<Property *>::iterator property_iterator;
00058 
00059     cout << "Neighbor list is based on the following cutoffs [type:type:cutoff]" << endl;
00060 
00061     // loop over these subproperites
00062     for (property_iterator = segments.begin(); property_iterator != segments.end(); ++property_iterator){
00063         string types = (*property_iterator)->get("type").as<string>();
00064         double  cutoff = (*property_iterator)->get("cutoff").as<double>();
00065 
00066         Tokenizer tok(types, " ");
00067         vector <string> segment_types;
00068         tok.ToVector(segment_types);
00069 
00070         // check if user provided two segment types
00071         if ( segment_types.size() != 2) std::runtime_error("error, two segment types separated by a space are needed for each cutoff");
00072 
00073         // sanity check is needed here to insure that segment type exists
00074         top->GetCrgUnitTypeByName(segment_types[0]);
00075         top->GetCrgUnitTypeByName(segment_types[1]);
00076 
00077         cout << " " << segment_types[0] << ":" << segment_types[1] << ":" << cutoff << "" << endl;
00078 
00079         _cutoff.push_back(cutoff);
00080         _typeA.push_back(segment_types[0]);
00081         _typeB.push_back(segment_types[1]);
00082 
00083     }
00084     
00085     cout <<"Using "<<_cutoff.size()<< " different types of pairs."<<endl;
00086 
00087   }
00088 
00089 inline bool Neighborlist::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top)
00090 {
00091     top->nblist().Cleanup();
00092 
00093     int pairtype;
00094 
00095     for (pairtype = 0; pairtype< _cutoff.size(); pairtype++) {
00096 
00097     //cout <<"TypeA:"<< _typeA[pairtype].c_str() << " TypeB:"<< _typeB[pairtype].c_str()<< " Cutoff:"<<_cutoff[pairtype]<<endl;
00098     top->nblist().setCutoff(_cutoff[pairtype]);
00099     BeadList list1, list2;
00100     list1.Generate(*top, _typeA[pairtype]);
00101     list2.Generate(*top, _typeB[pairtype]);
00102 
00103       // is it same types or different types?
00104         if(_typeA[pairtype]== _typeB[pairtype])
00105             top->nblist().Generate(list1);
00106         else
00107         top->nblist().Generate(list1, list2);
00108     }
00109        if (tools::globals::verbose) {
00110        QMNBList& nblist=top->nblist();
00111         for (QMNBList::iterator ipair = nblist.begin(); ipair != nblist.end(); ++ipair) {
00112 
00113         QMPair *pair = *ipair;
00114         QMCrgUnit *crg1 = pair->Crg1PBCCopy();
00115         QMCrgUnit *crg2 = pair->Crg2PBCCopy();
00116         cout<<" id segment A:" << crg1->getId() <<"    id segment B:" << crg2->getId()<< "   com distance:"<< pair->dist()<< endl;
00117         //cout<<"type A:" << crg1->getType().GetName() <<" name A:" << crg1->getName() << " id A:" << crg1->getId()<< endl;
00118     }
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 }}
